name: Talha Nadeem
profileTitle: Machine Learning Developer at Deeper Systems | Python | Flask | Deep learning | Data Science
about:
Energetic graduate of software engineering with an experience of 1.5 years in the area of Python development and
focused expertise in predictive model development using machine learning and deep learning techniques to build and

      modify algorithms to gain insights on data and yield predictions. Proficient in Python, Flask, Keras, Tenserflow
... see more

experience.jobDetails: Remote Job. Building deep learning predictive models using Keras and other frameworks. Working on millions of entries of data. Worked on prediction of orientation of images and predicting certain attributes of a board game.

Development and maintenance of "Aviation Safety Toolkit using Data Analytics" as a commercial and final year project. The project included analysis on all in-air aircraft data from ADS-B API and a web framework to showcase the analysis and predict the probability of a risk occurring based on certain conditions
Built a model as a freelance project for a colleague to predict the gender and emotion of a person or multiple person in an image or through real-time webcam using OpenCv, Caffe and Keras frameworks

1) Sentiment Analysis of Movie reviews. 2) Linear Modeling of Height vs Weight ( Manual and using Keras ). 3) Binary classification - Mines vs Rocks , Classifying movie reviews. 4) Multi-Class Classification - Identifying flower types, Classifying newswires. 5) Regression - Predicting House prices. 6) Modeling of Genetic Algorithm using Parent selection and crossover schemes

education.institute: NED University of Engineering and Technology
education.title: Bachelor of Engineering - BE
